metadata.title: CVE-2022-39201 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Grafana is an open source observability and data visualization platform.Starting with version 5.0.0-beta1 and prior to versions 8.5.14 and 9.1.8,Grafana could leak the authentication cookie of users to plugins. Thevulnerability impacts data source and plugin proxy endpoints under certainconditions. The destination plugin could receive a user's Grafanaauthentication cookie. Versions 9.1.8 and 8.5.14 contain a patch for thisissue. There are no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
